events: 24 Hour Events: patient reports chest discomfort that has been going on,   since around 1 or 1:30.  Describes it as pressure but mild ([**3-20**]). EKG,   shows different QRS morphology in V3 and V4 (paced beats looked,   different from EKG on [**9-28**]).  Gave him .3mg Nitro SL- chest pain,   completely resolved.  Patient started on heparin drip.  Enzymes being,   cycled.  Again had chest pain at 03.45- fully resolved with 2,   sublingual nitro.,   This AM- described same chest discomfort that occurred only when he,   ate/drank.  Was given GI cocktail.,
